case.title: Single for single - 42 (NYC)
case.text:
Can you help me? I'm looking for someone special and specific.
Me: Blonde,Blue Eyes, Curvy Easy on the Eyes Beauty, Clean, Non Smoker, No Drugs, educated and travelled.
You are 1. Not Married over 35 2. Attractive. Clean, Non Smoker 3. Easy on the Eyes Handsome 4. You should have a Great Sense of Humor and Love to have Fun 4. Must send recent picture.
And if you are interested in my post please know I'm NOT looking for a 1x hook up. I'm worth the effort.
And no I'm not weird, fake, married, or a freak. Just looking for someone special to spend some time with.
